translations: （尤指因某人亡故而）感到悲痛；使伤心

sentences.sentence: I didn't have any time to grieve.
Relatives need time to grieve over loved ones they have lost.
sentences.translation: 亲属需要时间痛悼他们失去的至爱。

sentences.sentence: He decided not to take his medicine, so as to grieve Wendy.
sentences.translation: 他决定不吃药，好让温迪伤心。
